data.title: The full list of Bafta 2024 film contenders
data.meta_description: Oppenheimer and Poor Things are the leading contenders for this year's British Academy Film Awards.
data.text:
Stars and the film world are gearing up for the Bafta Film Awards on Sunday, celebrating the best in big screen action over the past 12 months.

Christopher Nolan's Oppenheimer leads the pack, followed by Poor Things, Killers of the Flower Moon and The Zone of Interest.

Here is the shortlist in full ahead of the ceremony, which will take place at London's Southbank Centre on Sunday.

Best film

Anatomy of a Fall

The Holdovers

Killers of the Flower Moon

Oppenheimer

Poor Things

Outstanding British film

All of Us Strangers

How To Have Sex

Napoleon

The Old Oak

Poor Things

Saltburn

The Zone of Interest
